slides.title: Welcome
slides.content: Welcome to our group meetup facilitator! Let's get you started.

slides.title: Create Events
slides.content: Easily create and schedule group events with just a few taps.

slides.title: Vote on Dates
slides.content: Let your group members vote on the best dates for everyone.

slides.title: Instant Notifications
slides.content: Get notified instantly about event updates and confirmations.
